channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Absolute Genius with Dick and Dom
channel.desc: Dick and Dom reveal the genius of Alexander Fleming, the man who discovered penicillin. Inspired by Fleming's discovery, they come up with their own genius idea, which involves an attempt to turn billions of germs into priceless works of art.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve gets strangled by a python on a night-time river expedition, climbs a 40-metre tree and finds out why our thirst for palm oil is threatening bears and orangutans.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dengineers
channel.desc: Helena is 11 and an only child. She loves star-gazing, wants to be an astrophysicist when she's older and is passionate about girls getting into science. She lives above her mum and dad's bookshop where they often work seven days a week, which means she doesn't get the chance to get out and look at the night sky! Helena needs a den to help her reach for the stars and fulfil her science dreams.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch! Do Try This at Home
channel.desc: Did you know your body contains invisible ink! Find out how, and make your own in today?s Do Try experiment.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: In Ouchology, the doctors end up in a ball-throwing fight with their kid quizmasters, and it all ends with a snot, snot, snotting! Dr Xand rolls out the crushing machine in the lab to do an experiment to find out how strong your teeth are. It?s a packed Ouch and About, with George wanting to know why we burp, Clark asking why we need to sleep, and Ana asking why people have different eye colours. We fly across New South Wales, Australia, with Jesse and the Flying Doctors, to attend his hospital appointment in Sydney. In the emergency department, Nathan has an injured arm after jumping off the slide at Edinburgh Zoo and accidentally landed it, and Isabella is there after bending her finger backwards when catching the ball in Gaelic football practice.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: Dara O Briain joins Rattus for a show marking the 1969 moon landings. The first use of rocket power, the Space Race, and poo floating in the Apollo 10 cockpit - it?s all here.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: Dani Dyer becomes Rattus? political advisor as we look at everything from the birth of democracy to Margaret Thatcher having to change her voice so she would be taken more seriously.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
channel.desc: Nitro and Phantom prank Fire at a kids' birthday party! The rest of the Gladiators have fun behind the scenes and pranking the audience at Sheffield Arena.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. Only Danger Mouse can save the world from chaos when the Baron stops the world spinning with a plague of traffic lights.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse must fight his own urge to be awesome to stop the world turning into a gigantic intergalactic tourist attraction. Attempting to prove his theory that what the world always needs is a hero, Danger Mouse fights off what appears to be an alien invasion of Earth - but his inflated ego soon becomes the real intergalactic threat.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. When the Baron rearranges the countries of the world, Danger Mouse reluctantly joins forces with his American counterpart Jeopardy Mouse and takes New Zealand for a spin.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Convinced that Mrs Creecher is secretly a master of Blamjitsu, JJ persuades the gang to help trick her into revealing her blam credentials.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Doctor Pfooflepfeffer covets the world-beating power of Gnasher?s indestructible teeth and will stop at nothing to get her hands on one of those doggy dental marvels.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: In an attempt to deprive Gnasher of the food that fuels his active gnashy ways, Walter takes over Butch Butcher?s sausage-making business. His careless manufacturing produces a monster fatberg under Beanotown.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Herbert is starting to feel his age and secretly drinks from the Fountain of Youth. However, his desire to be young puts the whole quest in jeopardy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When the heroes are faced with the Goblin King moving into the Big Birch, they decide to invent a quest that will soon have him running back home.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: While questing to keep her hero safe on her long journey, superfan Blossom fusses and frets too much, making things awkward.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy wakes up, starving. But the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread is empty..

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy tries to catch a fish despite the Lemmings kitesurfing and the presence of a shark.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings search for a treasure to get food from a Yummy vending machine.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dragons: The Nine Realms
channel.desc: The Riders 'borrow' the bathysphere to rescue a dragon from the Giant Realm Sea.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dragons: The Nine Realms
channel.desc: Phil threatens to shut down D?Angelo?s new dragon hospital and ban dragons from Icaris.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Absolute Genius with Dick and Dom
channel.desc: Dick and Dom reveal the genius of Marie Curie, one of the most famous female scientists of all time. Inspired by Curie's genius ideas, they come up with their own, involving an exploding shed.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: Mankind's most ingenious inventors are given the Horrible Histories treatment, as we take in everything from the invention of the wheel to the crisp. Featuring the Gutenberg press and the man who invented both the dictionary (very successfully) and manned flight (less successfully). The Greeks and the Chinese battle over which of them are history's best inventors.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Science
channel.desc: Meet superheroes the Force Force, and some of the 17th century?s greatest minds star in Friends parody Colleagues.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: In the last episode of the series, the doctors reveal the amazing strength of your jaw, and they see if they can take the heat when they try their hands at being hospital ward chefs in Operation Takeover. Dr Xand joins the ear, nose and throat department to see how they fix their patients, and Dr Chris hits the wards answering questions for one last time in Ouch and About On Call. Meanwhile, in accident and emergency, one patient is treated for an injury to her neck, and another has cut his foot on a tin lid.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: It's breakfast time and the Farmer discovers he has no fresh milk for his morning cup of tea. He sets off in great haste, only to become ensnared in a rush-hour traffic jam. Shaun and the flock are too impatient to wait for breakfast and take matters into their own hands.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When Professor Squawkencluck's mum comes to visit, a gigantic, enraged rubbish monster is not far behind.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: JJ's so keen to get Dennis the new bike she thinks he's desperate to have, that she agrees to make a deal with Walter, and without realising it, passes on information that could lead to a jelly-blasting rampage.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When Girl gets the chance to put together the school fair, her friends and family jump at the chance to help - until she gets advice from a hardened businesswoman.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy discovers a large medieval magic trunk that can blend two objects into one.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings invent a whole bunch of bouncing games with spongy jelly.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigates strange events. When Ms O gets trapped in a mirror, an opposite Ms O enters the real world.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When Blossom accidentally uses a witch?s broom to make sticks for toasting marshmallows, the owner of the broom casts a spell of squeaky voices on all the heroes. The spell will be lifted once the heroes have returned with new broomstick branches. A simple enough quest, think the heroes, until they realise that a witch?s broom can only be made from the branches of the Really Spooky Tree.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve searches for deadly animals living in the capital of Suriname, from snakes in people's gardens to snail-catching kites and one of the deadliest snakes on earth.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bitesize Daily: 9-11 Year Olds
channel.desc: Learn about trade around the world, depending on other countries, and fair trade.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch! Do Try This at Home
channel.desc: The doctors investigate how your body digests fat and show you how to make bile art.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Hey You What If?
channel.desc: Venus has acid rain, crushing pressure, and is hotter than an oven, so it might not sound like the ideal place to live. However, up in the clouds it's almost just like home.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Our School
channel.desc: It?s the start of term, and the girls are arriving from all over the world to study. New student Cherry says goodbye to her family in Shanghai, and Spanish student Valentina swaps Barcelona for Bristol.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ten Pieces
channel.desc: A classical music adventure with the theme of nature. Today?s celebrated artists are Hans Zimmer, Vivaldi and Mason Bates.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Best in the World
channel.desc: Prepare for some monster truck mayhem and very clever canines.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: The Horrible History of (sometimes literally) dressing to kill. Henry VIII has beef over whose armour is best and Louis XV dresses as a hedge.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dengineers
channel.desc: Goalkeeper and football fan Tristan had to take a break from playing with his local team due to illness. He wants a den to help him recover and to store all his football memorabilia.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: Bound for their world tour, the Odd Socks detour to Moxy?s old school to wish an old teacher farewell. However, seeing the school in dire straits, the Odd Socks agree to help.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Jetters
channel.desc: Inspired by the statue of the Giant Buddha of Leshan, Ubercorn teaches the Go Jetters all about mindfulness to help them to concentrate, be calm and be kind to each other. They go to visit the massive thousand-year-old statue in China, which is carved into the mountainside by a river. Meanwhile, Grandmaster Glitch wants to have a statue of himself, but the Grimbots have made it too small. He takes them to Leshan to the Giant Buddha statue to show them how big his statue should be! But when he builds a giant viewing platform on top of a boat, he loses control of the boat and causes a whirlpool, putting the statue, tourists and himself at risk.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Cosima and Big Lizard go paddleboarding, but Dunk and the river creatures are behaving strangely. Could it be something to do with Dad's desire for a cup of tea.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: The Octonauts must get two mantis shrimp to stop fighting before their powerful claw strikes destroy the Octopod.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When all the other danger agents become supersmart due to a batch of genetically enhanced celery, Danger Mouse might need to find a new job.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Connie and Ruby move into Maple Close with their dog, Jelly. Mrs Hobbs can't help but express her disapproval. She hates dogs and now there'll be another one living in close proximity. Waffle is not allowed to go on a family camping trip but accidentally goes on a different adventure.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: Carrot is excited to show the Tato Team her new inventions, including an improved Robotato, who will help them protect the supermarket from Evil Pea. Unfortunately, Robotato still has a few glitches, so the veggies decide to test Carrot's new jetpacks instead, but Evil Pea sneaks in and commands Robotato to protect her. When Robotato continues to glitch, he becomes overly protective of Evil Pea and takes her to the top of Tato Tower to keep her safe. The Tato Team, led by the real Supertato, must use their new jetpacks to fly up and save her.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis dresses Gnasher up as a rare breed of animal which he says is nesting in Bash Street School, hoping to get the school shut down on the day of a daunting and difficult test.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Gnasher is practically immobile inside a full-body cast. When he goes missing, Dennis and the gang race all over Beanotown to find him, always one step behind the helpless hound.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Herbert has invented a new contraption to help him fly using an old set of bagpipes. The 'Herbecopter', as Herbert likes to call it, is rather noisy but extremely effective, and Twinkle is unhappy at no longer being the only flying hero. So, when the heroes quest to get Friendlyface?s priceless locket back from a dragon, Twinkle and Herbert become extremely competitive and risk completely failing the quest.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: A panicked factory owner asks the Ninjas for help to produce Xian Ye's action figure, but Konpeki's obsession with the soccer star makes it difficult to complete the task.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dumping Ground
channel.desc: Tyler's plan to put on a great magic show leads him to a first love with Chanelle, the mysterious daughter of a magic shop owner.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Grace puts her plan in jeopardy when she tries to decide the alternates on the behalf of Ariana. Meanwhile, Pete makes a shocking discovery.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: A special show featuring some of history?s greatest firsts, including the first ever library, Olympic Games, people on the moon and rat roller-skating on TV.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: It?s time for Gnasher?s annual bath, but the stinky hound will do anything to avoid the tub. Dennis and Gnasher go head to head in a town-wide game of cat and mouse ? or rather, tripe hound and wheelie bathtub.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. Penfold's chances of winning a Sidekickie award are in peril when Stiletto attempts to snatch the prize. Greenback plots to destroy the world with termites, and DM gets overly enthusiastic.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: In need of a ping-pong player for a charity competition, a coach orders one from the Ninjas, who deliver an unlikely duo to step in and save the match.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy decides to teach the Lemmings how to behave in his presence.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Stevie Smith challenges Boy in the mini-golf tournament. However, as they practice, they actually become fast friends and neglect their training to hang out! When the contest arrives, it is revealed Stevie was only pretending to be Boy's friend to keep him from practicing! But maybe Boy has a trick of his own up his sleeve..

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Blossom is terrible at keeping secrets, and Trevor can?t help but point that out. To prove him wrong, Blossom refuses to reveal the secret hiding place for her piece of the Amulet of Protection, even though the heroes need it to stop Balthazar casting a weather spell on the forest. With a rain of crabs heading their way, the heroes must quickly persuade Blossom to reveal her secret.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Olympia tries to win back a stolen gadget on a villain game show.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Agent Olympia is not happy when an agent with the same name shows up at headquarters. Curriculum: Measuring temperature.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Beth sets out to get rid of all their old toys, hoping Chef will buy the new toy she wants.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Riposte Prime.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Back on the Brave Olivine, Liko, Roy and Dot receive an unexpected challenge to battle.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Science
channel.desc: An episode featuring everything from the creation of the number zero to the beginnings of the whole universe. The moon gets lonely, there's an ISS cookery competition, and DI Loofah arrests a banana.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio as they attempt to win the regional dance championships. Eldon struggles to choose between Emily and Michelle as his partner for his duet performance. Meanwhile, West and Stephanie are at odds on how to proceed with their duet, leaving West wanting to quit altogether.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: A new season at Hawx Academy brings new faces, new challenges and old rivalries.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: The Farmer returns from the fair triumphant after winning a coconut. However, he soon discovers that getting into the coconut isn't as easy as it seems. Shaun and Bitzer take on the challenge and try every trick in the book, but it proves a tough nut to crack.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Squawkencluck reboots the now 100 per cent reliable Big Head base computer, which immediately locks up everyone in a maximum security prison.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: When Pieface rescues Walter and Bertie from danger, Dennis leads the town in celebrating Pieface Day in his honour, and refuses to listen when Pieface tries to tell him it was all one big mistake. Walter uncovers the truth, proclaims himself the bigger hero, and declares it Walter Week.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Dog has been hired as a security guard at the new community pool. When the kids discover the long line at the pool, they try to convince Dog to break the rules and let them in.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings happen upon a bracelet that increases the strength of its wearer.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy unwittingly brings to life some medieval armour.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigates strange events. The agents try to resolve a disagreement between Ms O and Oksana.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Hoofius has decided not to quest. Not because he would rather be doing a puzzle or playing his panpipes (though that is rather enjoyable), but because this will be his 1,000th quest and will be added to the Scroll of Honour for all to see for eternity. His friends reluctantly quest without him, but when they don?t return, Hoofius soon comes to regret staying behind.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve heads to the Mexican island of Cabo Pulmo, where the people have worked tirelessly to bring their surrounding oceans back to life and make it a marine reserve.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bitesize Daily: 5-7 Year Olds
channel.desc: Lean about identifying instruments, organising instruments, and playing untuned percussion.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch! Do Try This at Home
channel.desc: Your body?s largest organ is your skin ? find out how it works and how to make your own homunculus.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Hey You What If?
channel.desc: Find out how to shout from one side of the world to the other.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Our School
channel.desc: We go behind the scenes in the boarding house, where the girls take a weekend sightseeing trip to the historic city of Bath. House mistress Miss Hollingsworth gets more than she bargained for during Smoothie Night.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ten Pieces
channel.desc: A classical music adventure with the theme of home. Today?s celebrated artists are Kerry Andrew, Dvorak and George Gershwin.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Don't Blame Me, Blame My Brain
channel.desc: Ken's brain wants to know if it's possible to catapult yourself to the moon. Space expert Vinita Marwaha Madill and inventor Tom Stanton have answers - but Leila may have to test it out.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Best in the World
channel.desc: Best in the World is the entertainment clip show that invites CBBC viewers to playalong at home with Guinness World Records. We showcase the greatest and wackiest record breakers in hilarious guessing games - can you forecast the winner, solve what just happened or master how to take on a title at home? Coming up, REALLY big food and dogs that can skip! Take a seat and tune in.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: History tells of great minds coming together to achieve great things. It also tells of idiots combining to make an unholy mess. HH looks at some of the best and worst collaborations.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dengineers
channel.desc: Emily from the Scottish Highlands, near Inverness, is crazy about crochet, and her crafty creations are taking over the house and driving Mum and Dad mad. She desperately needs a space where she can crochet to her heart?s content, store all her woolly wonders and hang out with mates.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: Andy is determined to make the Odd Socks into ?proper? teachers, but the band?s unique methods lead to chaos. Can they turn it around before the school day ends.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Jetters
channel.desc: It's a whirlwind of windmill excitement as the Go Jetters travel to Kinderdijk in the Netherlands to celebrate National Mill Day. A lot of the Netherlands is below sea level and there is a high risk of flooding, so here at Kinderdijk, ditches and pumps are used to drain away the water. This used to be done by windmills using wind power, but nowadays the pumping stations are powered by diesel fuel or electricity, but the old windmills still work too! Whilst also flying over Kinderdijk, Grandmaster Glitch's Grim HQ runs out of fuel and crashes into the water. Furious, he sends the Grimbots off to find some fuel. They hook in to the Kinderdijk pumping station and start taking the fuel. Once they've taken all the diesel fuel for Grim HQ, the pump stops working and the water level rises, threatening to flood the area! The Go Jetters need to get the windmills going again to bring the water level back down.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: When Big Lizard and Cosima get covered in nectar, they become unwilling house guests to some overfriendly beetles. Will Dunk come to their rescue.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: The Octonauts follow a strange song to a lonely humpback whale who is alone because he doesn't sound like the other whales.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Has Danger Mouse finally met his match? An evil version of the hero escapes from a parallel dimension and joins forces with Baron Greenback.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Waffle is sad that Mrs Hobbs and her cat, George, are soon to leave Maple Close. The Brooklyn-Bells call on Mrs Hobbs to persuade her not to move house, only to find that her cat, George, has fleas. They offer to help and discover a secret about Mrs Hobbs.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: All the fruit and veggies in the supermarket are enjoying Fruit and Veggie Friends Day, but Evil Pea is determined to ruin it. After Supertato inadvertently stops her from taking the friendship cards and launching attacks with her pea shooter and freezy hose, Evil Pea tries to cover the party in ice cream. But when her plan goes wrong, she's rolled away on the ice cream tub, and Supertato saves her. Supertato has been trying to give her a friendship card all day long - Evil Pea furiously accepts it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: A classmate who Dennis and Walter barely know gets appointed as Class 3C?s late monitor, making it urgent that the boys find a way to pal up with him, whatever it takes.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis was up most of the night and can barely stay awake. Gnasher and the gang work hard to help steer dozing Dennis through the day, when all he wants to do is continue to dream about battling Zombie-Spiders.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When Blossom accidentally uses a witch?s broom to make sticks for toasting marshmallows, the owner of the broom casts a spell of squeaky voices on all the heroes. The spell will be lifted once the heroes have returned with new broomstick branches. A simple enough quest, think the heroes, until they realise that a witch?s broom can only be made from the branches of the Really Spooky Tree.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: When her superhero suit gets shrunk in the wash, Mega Hero Girl summons the Ninjas to find her a new one so that she can save a planet from an incoming asteroid.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter
channel.desc: Social media superstar Big Manny joins us for some mind-blowing science, along with his pal Big Danny from CBBC series Horrible Science! Meanwhile, Abby and Shini go head-to-head as they create crafts for Henry, and Joel tries one of the fastest racquet sports in the world.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Everything is on the line as A-Troupe band together to dance their best for the internationals re-adjudication. Their international dreams could come to an end right here.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: Doctors Chris and Xand van Tulleken join Rattus for a selection of old and new sketches relating to bodies.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: The after-school art club is under threat of imminent demolition. In trying to save the club, the gang end up on the trail of the mysterious undercover urban artist known only as Pranksy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. DM and Penfold go back to school to thwart the plans of an evil food scientist and his killer hot dogs.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: Keen to join a race with her classmates, a cavegirl orders a tame T-rex from the Ninjas. But they must work together with her teacher to train the unruly dinosaur.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings and Grizzy collide with Santa's sled while fighting.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Sick of being overlooked by the family because of his small size, Mouse builds an invention to make him grow. However, the bigger he gets, the more unintentionally destructive he becomes, and now the family needs to shrink him back to normal before he accidentally destroys them all.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The Gnome Crystal Mine has ground to a halt, leaving the forest with no crystals, no power supply and melting ice lollies! The heroes are tasked with a quest to find out what has happened and to fix it. It turns out that a slimy beast named Smarg has made the mine her home. But with Hoofius?s fear of gunk getting the better of him, evicting the slippery Smarg is not going to be easy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Ms O tells Olympia and Otis a story about a famous villain duo. Curriculum: Adding, subtracting and multiplying by zero.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Olympia and Otis are tasked with calling a truce between feuding guests. Curriculum: Using a Venn Diagram, 3D shapes: spheres and cubes.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: When the last page of the story-time book is lost, Gwen steps in to create the ending.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face an invisible enemy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Roy and Crocalor accidentally switch places while exploring a festival in Kitakami.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Science
channel.desc: Science goes too far in Fartenheimer, music goes too far in Heads, Shoulders, Knees, Toes and All the other Bones in the Body, and there's a Swiftian take on the water cycle.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: The A-Troupe is selected to perform in a music video for the band Brighter Brightest. However, the dancers become divided over the routine that Emily has choreographed.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Phoenix Rise
channel.desc: New term, new head teacher, new rules. The gang face their toughest challenge yet ? can they stay united and prove that no matter what the adversity, friendship always wins.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Torrential rain threatens to ruin the annual sheepdog trials, but the Farmer begs the judges for an opportunity to show off his talented flock. Things go smoothly until Timmy tries to learn to whistle. Will this stop the Farmer winning another cup to add to his prize collection.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse's attempts to boost Penfold's confidence backfire when they lead to a ferocious games monster escaping into the real world.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: The gang's efforts to help JJ master the ancient art of blamjitsu are ruined by Walter's plans to capture the Beanotown yeti. Dennis and the gang defend the yeti, and help JJ unleash her inner blam, in a gravity-defying blamjitsu face-off with the WilburCorp henchbot.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When Ripped Ab-Man asks Boy to help him win a game show, his siblings worry that he is being taken advantage of and decide to investigate.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings have fun painting themselves alongside the noblemen on artwork.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings meet fairies, one of which breathes life into their bagpipes.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigates strange events. It's party time for all the new agents at Odd Squad.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Trevor is extremely proud of being the clever one in the gang and thinks that his smart mouth is his superpower. However, his friends feel that sometimes his jokes go too far - and they are right to be concerned! When Mr Friendlyface sends the heroes on a quest to prevent Toothgrinder the Ogre from messing up the village green, it?s Trevor?s smart mouth that puts all the heroes in danger.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve heads to meet some of the most endangered animals in southern Africa - wild dogs. He meets the people working to save them and explores why their survival is so important.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bitesize Daily: 5-7 Year Olds
channel.desc: Learn about high- and low-pitched sounds, what pitch is, and what melody is.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch! Do Try This at Home
channel.desc: Did you know your body contains invisible ink! Find out how, and make your own in today?s Do Try experiment.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Hey You What If?
channel.desc: We try out three potential ways to become invisible and discover some surprising side effects.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Our School
channel.desc: As the girls celebrate Chinese New Year, PE teacher Miss Elsley believes netball player Jina could be destined for sporting success. She has arranged a visit from a local scout, but will Jina prove her potential.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ten Pieces
channel.desc: A classical music adventure with the theme of being all around the world. Today?s celebrated artists are Ravi Shankar, Grazyna Bacewicz and Aaron Copland.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Best in the World
channel.desc: Get ready for world-class bread-spreading and some super-charged water-sledding.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: Fred Sirieix guides Rattus through the Horrible History of Manners, including the benefits of not holding farts in and Puritan dating,. And Jane Austen visits Historical Love Island.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dengineers
channel.desc: Sea cadet Jonny became fascinated with naval history through his grandad and is now a huge fan. He wants a submarine-themed den where he can celebrate his passion, learn more and enjoy hanging out with mates.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: Pushed out of his comfort zone, Blu must tackle his inability to dance in order to put on a show and impress a celebrity judge. The whole school is counting on him.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Jetters
channel.desc: Grandmaster Glitch has been invited to Djenn? in Mali, Africa, to visit the people and to see one of his favourite things at work - mud! He is especially impressed by the spectacular Great Mosque of Djenn?, the largest structure made from mud in the world. But mud brings problems, and during the rainy season the rain causes damage to the walls of the mosque and the mud houses, so the local people get together to help repair them. Glitch wants to help, but when he realises they have to do this job every single year, he makes a massive umbrella to try to keep the mosque dry so that the local people don't have to repair it again. Although Glitch was only trying to help, things start to go wrong. The huge Grimbrella swings too close to the mosque and goes out of control. The Go Jetters need to fix that Glitch.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Whilst Dad is stuck in the desert, D.O.R.I.S. tries to give Cosima and Big Lizard a lesson on friction. As things begin to heat up, a creature steals Cosima's only means to locate Dad.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: Animated series. When a storm washes Peso onto a mysterious, rocky island, he meets a band of lobster-like insects thought to be extinct.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse and Penfold become reluctant parents when it appears the Baron has wiped his own memory.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: It's Waffle's birthday and Mr Willow throws a huge party for him. As the Brooklyn-Bells prepare a surprise for Waffle, Connie and Ruby's dog, Jelly, leads the Wonder Dog astray.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: Supertato, Carrot and the Grape Kids are enjoying flying kites until Evil Pea arrives in her balloon and cuts them down so she can rule the supermarket skies! Supertato and Carrot must climb a display of chopsticks to retrieve the kites from the top. Evil Pea threatens to cut them down again, so Supertato and Carrot turn their kites into hang-gliders and embark on an epic aerial chase with Evil Pea, leading to her bursting her balloon on a chopsticks display sign. Supertato and Carrot land safely on the ground, ready to fly kites again.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Determined to prove he can accomplish a task without getting distracted, Dennis takes on the simple job of bringing the class register to the school office. He instantly distracts himself on an epic scale.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Miss Mistry arranges to tag along with Dennis and the gang after school, in an attempt to enhance her teaching skills and prevent school governor Pfooflepfeffer from banning her beloved teaching magazine.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Hoofius has decided not to quest. Not because he would rather be doing a puzzle or playing his panpipes (though that is rather enjoyable), but because this will be his 1,000th quest and will be added to the Scroll of Honour for all to see for eternity. His friends reluctantly quest without him, but when they don?t return, Hoofius soon comes to regret staying behind.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: The Ninjas bring superstar Jean Pascal to the aid of a princess who orders a talented musician to help in calming her difficult dragon.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dumping Ground
channel.desc: Carmen drops May-Li's valuable antique necklace down the toilet and is torn over whether she should try to get it back or lie.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Anthony is put in a tough position when Ariana asks to be let back on the team. Ethan works towards something new, and Ebby has her first date with Remy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: A pirate captain worries about an early bedtime, a soldier from World War I struggles to cook with fake food and the four King Georges form a boy band.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Convinced that Mrs Creecher is secretly a master of Blamjitsu, JJ persuades the gang to help trick her into revealing her blam credentials.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. Part one of two. Danger Mouse faces his toughest challenge ever as a mysterious super-villain releases all the villains from Arkwright and plots the end of our hero.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: A girl orders a beatboxing teacher after seeing a professional beatboxer in the park. However, the Ninjas must first figure out what beatboxing is.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy confiscates the remote control device, but the Lemmings find another one.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: After a bad haircut, Dog tries wearing a fancy tuxedo until his fur grows back. Unfortunately, his initial reaction to wearing clothes causes him and the gang to accidentally destroy the rich neighbour lady's fence. But while the others are forced to rebuild it, the neighbour lady gives tuxedo-clad Dog a pass, thinking someone of his style and class is too good for manual labor. Resentment grows as the gang breaks their backs in the hot sun while Dog lives the good life with the fancy lady. How long can this go on.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Mr Friendlyface is acting very strangely indeed. He refuses to stamp any of Admin Bunny?s documents, keeps getting distracted by butterflies, and seems oddly happy! The heroes are extremely suspicious and decide that someone must have swapped him with a doppelganger. Now they must quest to find out where the real Friendlyface is and get him back before the forest descends into total chaos.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: When Oona, Olympia and Otis accidentally change the past, they undo every odd case the Odd Squad have ever solved.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Beth shares her slime recipe with her friends, and together they create a goo monster.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug faces Argos.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Tinkatink puts up a fight when a wild Bombirdier tries to mess with its beloved hammer.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Science
channel.desc: Fred Sirieix stars in Scientific First Dates, Marie Curie reacts to space, and the dinosaurs get an unwelcome musical meteor visitor.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: In an effort to spend more time with Riley, James accompanies her to pick up costumes for the troupe. At the studio, Stephanie takes part in a photoshoot.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Beaker Girls
channel.desc: Jess and Tracy Beaker are loving their new life by the seaside, but the arrival of teenage runaway Jordan is about to change everything for the Beaker Girls.
